text: Can anyone here help a ruby newbie with an issue on the official HubSpot-api-client gem?
After installing the gem and following the instructions the `Crm` module is missing from the `HubSpot` module
Hi all, is it possible using the API, to get out all of the database field internal names and the field type?
<@UN0LAJR3J> you can use <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/v2/get_table|get_table> to get details for a table, including column names, labels, and type.
Can you open up an issue here? <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-ruby/issues>
In case youâ€™re question was more about the CRM than the HubDB system, you might want the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties|properties API > <@UN0LAJR3J>
